sentence: The  Palestinian  health  ministry  says  a  13-year-old  boy  became  the  seventh  victim  to  die  following  raids  and  drone  attacks  in  the  occupied  West  Bank  area  of  Jenin  on  Tuesday.
The  IDF  has  announced  the  deaths  of  two  more  soldiers  -  Col  Itzhak  Ben  Basat  and  Sgt  Eran  Aloni  -  who  were  killed  in  northern  Gaza  fighting  yesterday.
